name: Asteroids (itch) (Surli)
description: Hey this is my first game and if you are interested in learning how to make it download Game Maker and follow this link: https://www.yoyogames.com/blog/485/make-your-own-arcade-classic-with-our-new-tut...  I used GML and its an arcade shooter where you shoot asteroids score 100 points to win hope you enjoy! Send me your feedback.
